title: [Resolved] @Riot What's the current trace route IP?
body: Title, trying to figure out the issue with my ISP and it's connection with ur servers

replies.body:
Here are the IP's you can use for Tracerts:
> (tracert 103.240.227.5) > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"
or 
(tracert 103.240.227.25) > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

Thanks dude
edit: is it meant to time itself out? Or keep going till I tell it to stop?
It should time itself out around 15-30 hops.
